# fastlystoreitems Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "fastlystoreitems" {
  api_key = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Fastly API Key from https://app.fastly.com/#account
- `base_url` (String) Fastly API URL
